title: 13-year-old girl shot in foot after gun accidentally goes off
content:
MESA, AZ (3TV/CBS 5) -
A 13-year-old girl was shot in the foot Saturday evening after a gun accidentally went off.
It happened around 5 p.m. near 55th Avenue and Clarendon.
Phoenix police say this was an accidental discharge of the gun by the 13-year-old in her home.
The young patient was transported to a local pediatric trauma center in serious but stable condition.
